name: Synthetic
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam:

My Interpretation of the theme "Let there be Chaos" was the idea of some sort of creature being released out into its laboratory and causing mayhem as it tries to escape. The gameplay is designed to make you feel powerful compared to the humans and extremely dangerous. 

(For anyone stuck, the exit on the final level is directly in the middle of the stage)

Controls:
  • WASD / Arrow Keys to move
  • Mouse to Aim
  • Left Click to punch enemies, knocking them back (squish if hit wall or each other)
  • RightClick to Grapple level or enemy
Nearly all assets in this game were made by me. Here is the stuff that wasn't:
  • Ambiance SFX
  • Alarm SFX
  • All art and other SFX were made by me during the Jam : D
  • I did also use a few plugins such as EZCameraShake, LeanTwean, etc

Thanks so much for playing:

Devlog coming soon (maybe): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCk7VZdutvv1aCJRqHal-Gmg

See more stuff I do: https://twitter.com/DawnosaurDev
